Review.Titre: **CAUTION** Use caution when purchasing software from MyChoiceSoftware & pay attention to license!!!
Review.Contenu: If I could give it a zero star I would. I purchased Microsoft Home and Business for my home computer from Mychoicesoftware.com. This worked on my computer, HOWEVER it is not at all clear on their product page that this is NOT a product that you can transfer, or reload. After having this installed on my computer, I uninstalled and went to reinstall on a new computer. After over 2 hrs on the phone with Microsoft, I was told that this was NOT a product for consumer sale (see screenshot), and used a developer license. After reaching out to Mychoicesoftware customer support, was told that this was clear on the product page and that because I loaded it one time they were good. So for a savings of $20 from the full Microsoft license, I don't have any ability to reload a product that was not intended for resale to begin with. Spend the extra little bit and buy direct from Microsoft so you can reload as needed and have for the true life of the product, not only a one time use. Disappointing customer service and even more disappointing they sold a product that shouldn't have been sold and did NOTHING about it.

Review.Titre: The software I purchased will not load…
Review.Contenu: The software I purchased will not load on to my computer. Evidently I don't  have enough space as my computer is several years old.  I contacted the company and was told to call them and they would help me figure it out.  I have tried to call twice and have been put on hold and then disconnected both times.  I contested the charge with AMEX and was told the company wanted to deal with me directly to process a refund.  So, I am stuck in the middle of lots of red tape when all I want is my $100 back for software I cannot use.I received messages from your office on my phone.  When I tried to return the call (from Gabe on 9/22) the first time, I was sent to a voicemail, where I left a message. I received a call from someone else (Alex on 9/25), and then again today.  I am tired of playing phone tag over an issue that I have explained REPEATEDLY.  If you are not interest in returning my money as I asked, so be it.  Let your actions stand as a reflection of your customer service and your commitment to quality service.  I am done!

Never got an answer. Big surprise. They are a sub-par 3rd party seller. I seem to recall litigation between them and Microsoft for similar behavior. Do not trust them.

I have purchased SEVERAL dozen Office 2019 product codes from MyChoice over the last few years.   I have noticed that the codes that I have been purchasing are not following the procedures that Microsoft states must be used to "activate" those codes.  I have tried to activate several product codes that can not be activated and EVERY code I have received from MyChoice I have had to use the Telephone activation to activate the product.  According to Microsoft agents this is NOT normal and is a sure sign of Fraud.   Today (January 2022) I had a PC that I had purchased Office 2019 for in September 2019. It had run an MS update that corrupted the Office install.  I eventually had to completely uninstall office na dtry to reinstall office.  It would not activate. I tried several methods to activate it and each time it failed.  I contacted MS support adn they told me the product had been activated at least 30 times by 20 different Hardware IDs and it was first activated PRIOR to the date I purchased the product key from MyChoice.  MyChoice maintains that they do not sell used products  but cannot explain explain how my product keys were activated PRIOR to me purchasing them from MyChoice.  They refuse to replace the product key and say that Microsoft's system are in error.   Given all the problems I've had with Activated dozens of Product ID's from Mychoice, it now makes sense what they've been doing.  I spent over 3 hours on the chat with Microsoft discussing all of this and over 1.5 hours on the chat with MyChoice.  I have both transcripts and have filed a fraud case with Microsoft against MyChoice and am contacting my attorney's to begin legal proceedings against MyChoice.  Do yourself a favor and DO NOT purchase from them.

This site advertises rewards points on every purchase. But, this is a lie and fraudulent. First of all you don't get rewards on "every" purchase, you only get rewards on select purchases. Even worse, you can't actually use the points you get for future purchases. I have had to call in no less than 8 times to try and get my points used. They conveniently hide the button that lets you use points for your purchase. I have tried multiple browsers, incognito, deleted cookies and history, none of their suggestions worked. These people are just engaging in a boatload of false advertising.

I purchased Office 2019 Home & Business on Dec. 6. I received my new laptop on Dec. 7 and installed Office Dec. 12. I followed the instructions for installation sent by mychoicesoftware. The setup process did NOT ask for the activation key, but reported that setup was complete.When I opened Word, I was asked for the activation key. I entered it, but a message appeared saying that the key had been used. I was sent to Microsoft activation and had to activate by phone. That process required sending TEN SEVEN-DIGIT numbers, then receiving and typing, TEN SEVEN-DIGIT numbers. What a pain!Two minor points:The sales interface never said this was 32-bit software, not 64-bit.The installation instructions do not tell us to right-click the image drive letter and then choose "eject."

Review.Titre: Spend the extra $ and go right to the source
Review.Contenu: Purchase was relatively simple, though the email with the activation code for Windows 10 didn't come through for about 12 hours. I followed instructions for installing Windows 10 from a USB thumb drive, and it installed as advertised--but then the activation key didn't work. Microsoft's solutions are a maze of recursion and self-contradiction, and nothing from Mychoicesoftware helped to clear up the confusion. I needed to get Windows up and running swiftly, and I'm coming up on 24 hours into what should have been a simple installation and activation. I know Microsoft is a nightmare, but I'm wishing now that I'd just bought the (admittedly more expensive) option from the Microsoft Store.Followup: Mychoicesoftware gave me instructions as to how to get in touch with Microsoft. Microsoft Support walked me through the verification process and informed me that the software activations had been "exhausted" and that they couldn't help me. I've gone back to Mychoicesoftware to see what their solution is but given the time and energy I've invested to get this to work, I am definitely paying for having cheaped out. Will edit again when I have some sort of resolution, but the vibe is bad.

MyChoiceSoftware offers Microsoft software like Visio through volume licensing with only requirement being an .edu e-mail address. Unfortunately, this is delivered via an ISO installer type downloaded from Microsoft, and this installer type is not compatible with other installer types like Click to Run. Simply put, you can get a great price but you may not be able to install it. This isn't MyChoiceSoftware's fault, but this issue isn't disclosed, and they have no other option to get you installed without spending hundreds more for a different install type of the identical software.The company has been responsive with support, but refund is taking longer than it should. In all it has been a big hassle, and the software I wanted is not installed. MyChoice Software has an opportunity to inform their customers of this issue prior to purchase.

Review.Titre: They will tell you what you want to hear
Review.Contenu: Exceptionally irritated is an understatement. I have a computer that I specifically want to keep off of the web. The software shown on the website was download only. In a web chat with their sales support, I explained my issue and was told that if I purchased a "Retail package" of the software I would be able to load it without a web connection. The retail package cost more than the download and I had to pay shipping. When I received it, there was no disk, only the key code in the package. I called their customer support and was told that I could download the software to a flash drive on a connected computer and then move it to the desired computer and activate it by phone. The reality is that you cannot even begin a download without providing the key code. So much for knowledgeable customer support. Nothing worked but to compromise my sterile system.
Didn't receive the license in the time frame I was told, and also wasn't told I would need to purchase an additional license in order to download.

Review.Titre: I purchased Microsoft Office for Mac …
Review.Contenu: I purchased Microsoft Office for Mac 2016.  A conflict between Mac OS Sierra and MS Word Mac 2016 surfaced within a month of my purchase (MS Word Open command hangs if Mac Sierra (10.12.3) dictation commands are turned on.  This results in Force Quit of Word and corrupted preferences.  Turning off dictation entirely solves the problem.  If dictation is turned on after opening Word, the problem remains.  The conflict was confirmed by Apple, but they are unable to view Word programming in order to pinpoint the issue.  I have sent logs demonstrating the problem to Microsoft support with no response.  This remains unresolved. This is a major conflict for anyone who uses dictation to help compose written documents, especially those who are physically or visually disabled.My only issue with Mychoice software is that, as a Microsoft affiliate, they have not been able to troubleshoot or advocate for me.Buyer beware.

Review.Contenu: I am ready to quit.  I am really disappointed in the installation process.  The assistant I had was NO help.

I've had one long series of problems upgrading to Windows 10.  Initially, I received an email offering me a free update to Windows 10, but when I used the link that was emailed to me, the Windows 10 update was installed, but my Windows 8.1 was not replaced, so my computer seemed to have both systems battling it out. (That was the consensus of our two IT guys, our internet provider, and the two senior technicians at the Microsoft store with whom I consulted.) Due to the many problems I experienced as a result of this issue, I decided to just purchase a new Microsoft license and start over. Yesterday I purchased Microsoft License for Home Order #20076620.  When I received my activation code, the email said that the Windows 10 Home version that I had purchased was out of stock so I had received a complimentary upgrade to the Pro version.  I then initiated the Windows 10 download with the link provided, which went fine until I entered the license code that was sent in that same email.  Then I got this error message: "This key doesn't work with this edition of Windows. Try a different key."   Overall, this entire process has been very frustrating, as I've consistently followed the instructions in the emails that Microsoft sends.
Not sure who was at fault but the program would not download and had to be returned.

Review.Titre: I won't purchase here again - Product received, but they tried to charge me for things I did not want without my permission
Review.Contenu: I received my Microsoft Office subscription with no problem.My complaint is that for several weeks after my purchase I received emails telling me that I had received 5 "complementary" installations for Office 365 with my purchase to be used on separate computers, and it asked whether or not I would want these. Cool. I didn't know whether I would take advantage of the offer or not, so I did not reply yet. Then after about a month I received an email saying that in a few days I would start being charged $10/month for these subscriptions unless I said otherwise.So... they signed me up for a "complementary" subscription that I did not ask for and were going to charge me if I didn't "opt out!" I used my credit card on their site to buy one thing - I did NOT give them permission to save my credit card information to be used to purchase other subscriptions that I didn't specifically say I wanted. I did reply and "opted out," but in order to charge me, I should need to opt in, not just not opt out. And after they sent me like 5 emails saying over and over that it was complementary, it could have been very easy to miss the email that said they would start charging me in a few days. Very unprofessional and unethical in my opinion. I won't be purchasing from them again, because I don't trust how they will use my credit card information.

Review.Titre: Not as easy as it sounds
Review.Contenu: After purchasing a license for Microsoft Publisher, I received an email with instructions for downloading the program. It stated only 3 steps were required: "1. Click on the preferred download link.2. Once the page loads, select "Download."3. Insert key code when prompted and you're all done!"Well, that was a fabrication! I was given a download link with DropBox and when I got to the page, DropBox told me I needed to sign up for the service.  I contacted MyChoice and they told me to bypass the DropBox signup, so I did, and then I was able to download. However, during Setup after typing in the Product Activation Key, the Software reported that "too many downloads had been made using that Key" and refused to let me continue the Setup! So, I had to contact MyChoice again with a problem.  When I got their response a day later, I was told I had to accomplish the telephone call-in to Microsoft to get my software to activate. I had to leave on a business trip so it was 3 days before I could attend to it. The Microsoft activation stuff itself is nuts: you have to carefully copy about a dozen sets of letters/numbers before you finally achieve the activation for your software. In other words, Step 3 above "insert the Key Code and you're all done!" is a bunch of baloney, as this took me not only hours of my time directly working on trying to activate the software, but it ran into days because of delays communicating with MyChoice. How is that a good experience? And furthermore, if I should have to re-install my software after reloading Windows 10 at a later date, am I going to have to go through this nonsense all over again?  Sure, Microsoft Publisher now works on my comuter, but believe me, you're better off paying a little more to get the software on a DVD and avoid this activation license procedure! It's too much hassle, especially if your time is valuable to you and you have better things to do than sit at your computer all day. MyChoice Software needs to be up-front about the procedure and tell buyers that it may be much more complicated than they are claiming.

The average person would of been spending time with technical support. It is download and it does work. I was very happy about this. My software hard copy was delivered as promised.

Review.Titre: Adequate service but lack of guidance
Review.Contenu: I purchased Office 365 Personal for my new laptop, wishing to add Skype for Business to my laptop. The site I used didn't make it clear about the proper version to buy. Unfortunately I bought the wrong version so had to remove this version and buy the Premium edition. No way for this site to offer any sort of upgrade. So I ended up paying for two licenses , one of which I will never use.

only problem: I expected to be able to download the software product immediately after my payment was submitted. Instead I got a msg., after paying, that they'd email me instructions for downloading the following business day.  If you're going to take my $ for immediately downloadable software, but not let me do so upon payment, then say so explicitly, in large bold letters. Before I pay.

This was by far the best deal I found online and I only felt comfortable buying from them because they were rated as a Google Trusted Store.  That being said, the wrong platform product key was sent to me, but they discovered the mistake before I could.  Although, I was still confused and did accidentally validate the Windows platform product key before realizing the alternate email was the new Mac platform product key.

Review.Titre: License required complicated Microsoft activation but MyChoice Sales Support was helpful in resolving.
Review.Contenu: Software license didn't work initially.  However, sales phone support person guided me through calling the automated Microsoft activiation support line to get it going.  Also, I ordered MS Project Standard.  It was out of stock, but I was issued a license for Project Professional at no extra charge. 'Experience could have been much worse for both glitches above.

The original activation key sent to me was rejected by Microsoft with an error that it had already been activated too many times.  My initial call to tech support at Mychoice required several steps and I never received a new key.  I emailed complaining about piracy and received a new key immediately that worked.So bottom line, they took care of me.  But the excess activation was a flag to me that things might not totally be on the up and up.

Review.Titre: My only issue relates to the download …
Review.Contenu: My only issue relates to the download link and its incompatibility with different web browsers.  I am on a Mac platform and use Safari as my default browser.  the download link did not work.  It required a phone call to technical department and they suggested FireFox or Chrome.  as with Safari, Firefox did not work either.  downloaded Chrome and was finally able to access the download link.  Would think a "heads up" in your instructions would be appropriate.

The download went smoothly, but I had some difficulties in verifying my license. It was more complicated than I thought.I definitely think there should have been MORE support / explanation / assistance.I couldn't go back to my invoice / transaction page to print out receipt. The email receipt was not clear enough to provide to my company.

I received confirmation that my order was received, and that I should receive another email with a license code within 30 minutes.  I called 48 hours later to find out what the delay was, and was told there was a question about the payment address.  It was easily resolved, but feel that someone from Mychoicesoftware should have contacted me.

Review.Titre: Works perfectly but couldn't register it
Review.Contenu: Just like my other Publisher and easy to install, but when Microsoft asked for a registration, the code given to me with the software had been used too many times and Microsoft refused to license it.So, as long as I do not want to upgrade in the future or reinstall it, I'm fine.  If one of those two things happen, I will be out of luck.

Attempted to buy Excel 2013, but needed to confirm that the Add-In I required was available for that version.  They could not confirm that, even after consulting with Microsoft.  They were pleasant and professional and tried to be helpful, although I did not  get the answers I needed, so, I needed to get a refund. They charged me a 15% restocking fee and refunded my money after I re-contacted  them 8 days later.  They tried hard, so I gave them 3 stars, and they were courteous the whole time.

I have always had good experiences with My Choice until my last two purchases. I ordered Visio 2016 but it never stated anywhere that you had to have Office 2016 for it to work. They would not give me a refund. That's ok... I'll save it for when we get Office 2016. But then I went back and ordered Visio 2013 and we NEVER could get it to install. Tech support was pretty lackluster on helping to get it resolved.Two weeks later they finally agreed to give us a refund. Not so happy anymore :(

The purchase went smooth, but downloading the software did not. I understand that most poor reviews are user lack of knowledge or abilities that then get blamed on the vendor. But I feel confident as a user that the instructions did not line up with the actual procedure for downloading the software.

I was using Internet explorer 11 to down load. it would get 61% DL and crap out.  Tried the Google garbage and receive software automatic that I did not want.  I ask for a refund and was promised that I would receive it.I has always amazed me about all business can take you money in one day, but takes 7 to 10 days to get a refund. Will become 81 years of age this month and things were simpler back when business were more honest than they are now.  There is hardly a business that does not have some catch to pick your pockets.

Review.Titre: Decent price but not without issues
Review.Contenu: This was a license key order for MS Publisher.  The purchase process was pretty easy and the price was good.  I received a license key fairly quickly.  Unfortunately the key proved to be invalid.  I sent a message to customer support and I was subsequently issued a replacement key.  This key turned to be for MS Office Professional, which is not what I ordered.  I sent another message to customer support and was informed that I was to just use the "Office" key and I could install Publisher, which is part of Office Pro.
how to launch program?

The initial Activation code that i Received after the purchase was an incorrect one. After talking to customer service as McAfee (the contact given in the email is not their own service personnel), I was told that the activation code was an inactive one and That I need to contact the company where I purchased it from. With much difficulty, I managed to reach "Mychoicesoftware" and did get a new code and installed the product. So it all worked out in the end but for the time and frustration. Not worth the slight reduction in product price, in my opinion.

Was originally sent Windows XP 64-bit, even though I requested 32-bit and it was SP2, not SP3. If you can connect to the internet then I guess it should update/upgrade to SP3, but since I couldn't connect to the internet until it was SP3 (bug with my VM software and SP2) it was a bit of a problem; I want sent a dead link to get SP3 online by customer service and ended up having to find it online myself. All in all, I would say it works and customer service was very quick in answering emails/phone calls, even if they weren't always helpful in solving the issue.

If you are buying Microsoft Office, apparently there are 2 versions.  One you pay for on a recurring annual basis ( this was not made abundantly clear to me );  the other is a one time fee ( about twice the price ) but good forever which is the one I would have selected

Review.Titre: Three of Five due to foul play...

There should be more soon, as some projects come to a close soon...Tim

I ordered a boxed product because I have ordered software online in the past and sometimes you get software listed in another user name. Received confirmation that it was in stock and would be shipped soon. A week later received notice the boxed product was no longer available but would be sent as t download product. Tried to download but had to contact mychoice to obtain correct number to download software, the number sent would not work. Software works fine but whole process seemed sketchy. Seems like a software company would have inventory control software that would know immediately what was in stock and notify customers at time of purchase.

Review.Titre: I am rating this company fair because…
Review.Contenu: I am rating this company fair because it took a lot of explaining and me contacting Microsoft to confirm that the product I purchased was a legitimate, legal product code.  If only the web site informed/educated the customer that the product could not be registered with Microsoft and why, it would have made a big difference in my experience.  Only after a lot of back and forth emails with My Choice Customer Service, who were very patient, and my contact with Microsoft was my concern answered and remedied.  At the end of of it all, all is fine, I am pleased with my purchase, and I would purchase from My Choice again and I will recommend the site to friends.  If my next purchase goes smoothly, I will re-rate my experience and expect it to be 5 stars.

Had multiple problems with Office authorization code which required several interactions with support to straighten out.  Shouldn't have had to go through all that, though it was eventually solved to my satisfaction.

This is the 2nd copy of Office Suite 2007 I have bought from MyChoice Software. Both transactions were very smooth and easy. But, this is the 2nd time I have had to go through the extra steps to activate the product as well. It was not as easy as just clicking the activate now button and done. I had to have Microsoft text me a code and enter a code in from the screen to activate. Both copies did activate with no issues after I did this. I have bought copied of this Office Suit from other vendors in the past and have not had to go through these extra steps. Just takes a little more time to do that is all. Overall they were the best priced. I will most likely go back to them for more software as I need.

Review.Titre: I was told that if I had problems with installing software, call Microsoft.
Review.Contenu: I felt that there was no support from Mychoicesoftware if I was to have a problem. I had problems with installing the software and with the help of AVG, we finally got it installed with over 6 hours to complete.

The licensing instructions and process could be explained better.  It was confusing and I had to switch to telephone rather than online to get it corrected.  It was confusing for an average computer user.

I purchased this download on a Saturday and expected a fairly immediate ability to receive the code for installation.  It took almost 4 hours to receive the code.  I felt this was unacceptable.

Review.Titre: i was very impressed with the Window7 to 10 upgrade
Review.Contenu: i was very impressed with upgrading my Windows 7 to Windows 10.Per the Mychoicesoftware email, i downloaded Windows 10 Professional Media Creation Tool.This above tool managed the upgrade and maintained all my documents, Applications and Firefox Bookmarks in Windows 10.I didn't have to go to any of of DVD backups that I created for the upgrade. It took a few hours for the upgrade but i didn't have to deal with any issues.The only small issue was that the Mychoicesoftware email was misleading, it said: We are currently out of stock of the Home version of Windows 10, so we have provided you with a complimentary upgrade to Windows 10 Professional!				When I checked on the Windows 10 that was installed, it was the Home version, not Professional 									 Great Job, Mychoicesoftware !!

License was needed quickly (Sunday morning, my IT was closed) but the 30 minute delivery service advertised is only during normal business hours.  You don't find this out until you are further into the purchase. Then it gets trickier with one screen advising it takes up to 4 hours to deliver on the weekend and another place it tells you they batch and only orders received before 10 AM PST will deliver that day.  After 4 hours I really got nervous since I was on the way to the airport for a business meeting out of the country.  I called the company, sent and email and voila the key code arrived.  It all worked out but a lot more stressful than I anticipated.  We had some questions the following week and they were super helpful on the phone (during normal hours)
I had some trouble getting the programs to download and it took a bit of time to get it fixed - but tech support were very helpful and kind.  They did follow-up to make sure I was satisfied.

I just upgraded my PC Windows to 2016, I started to do the setup for the Visio 2013 and it told me, at the beginning of the install that I had to put my operating system back to Windows 7 or 8. I sent you're support group with my problem, but didn't get a response till the next day. So what I did was contact Microsoft Office and they registered the 2013 Pro and then sent me the setup for Visio Pro 2016 no charge. When I did hear back from your support, they told me there wasn't anything they could do. Out of courtesy I emailed you're support back on what I did and it was kind of un-customer service that they didn't come back to me with at least, thanks for the heads up.

Review.Titre: Great software purchase experience but the pricing is a bit confusing
Review.Contenu: The MS Project 2010 Standard license is a great software and the price is reasonable.   I have no issue with the overall buying experience and the activation process.  My only concern is that the academic edition (AE) cost the same as the standard version ($149 USD) but the AE version license has expiry date.  If that's the case, why would anyone buy the AE version?Mychoicesoftware has responded to me that the note about AE license will expiry is incorrect and AE can only be installed in 1 PC and (I think) the AE cost should be cheaper than standard version.  However, if you see the mychoicesoftware website for MS Office 2010 AE, it still show $149 and indicated the AE license will expire in the description.  This page should be updated to reflect the correct price and description of the AE version.

Review.Titre: Great but I don't want Office 365 - be sure to uncheck this box!
Review.Contenu: I ordered a single copy of Office 2013.  Great product.  Excellent price.  Prompt delivery.  Easy download and installation.  I didn't notice the check box for the "free" 5 additional installs of Office 365 and neglected to uncheck it, so now I am being pestered to activate the product so that my 30 days "free" trial can quickly expire and I can begin paying $9.90 a month for something I don't need.  I understand that lots of software and other products come with these "on approval" items and I should have been more careful to look for this and uncheck what I did not want, but it is not an added value (I can get a free trial and the same monthly price directly from Microsoft).  It takes away from the otherwise excellent experience with MyChoiceSoftware and seems kind of slimy.
I have not been able to access Word as it says I'm not activated! I have gone through the whole activation steps and still can't access Word.
This software was difficult to download for the average person. I had to have my boyfriend who is an IT professional help me download the software on to my computer.

Paid $200 for a Windows 7 64 bit disk on February 11.  Package was sent by Mychoicesoftware and was to arrive on February 18 in Mississauga, Ontario, Canada.  It's now March 16 and I'm no closer to receiving my package.  While it's FedEx that screwed up I did report to your company that I hadn't received my package and have heard nothing since.  FedEx told me that they weren't responsible and that I'd have to contact Mychoicesoftware.  When I refused to make another long distance phone call from Ontario to California it was dropped there.  They insist that your company give permission to enter a claim.  I'm a senior citizen who lives on a pension and can't afford the loss of $200 and feel that I should not be the one making all of the phone calls trying to track down this item.  Hopefully, some day, I will get my disk or a refund so I can purchase another disk.
Your tech support was good and fast.  However, you didn't explain initially tht older versions of office require telephone registration as opposed to online.
After I downloaded the software, there was a $9.90 charge put on my credit card for some unknown reason.  People should not add charges without notification.

Review.Titre: Ordered Norton 365 and received Norton Security product serial number
Review.Contenu: After completing my order I was disappointed about 2 things and they are:1. The on-line store was closed and I had to wait until the next day to receive the serial number for activation. (Never had an incomplete order after payment because an on-line store was closed). If you cannot complete an order you should notify the customer before accepting their payment. When it comes to antivirus software the customer may need the product at the time of the order not the next day.2. I ordered Norton 365 and received a product key for Norton Internet Security. (Wish they had just said only Internet Security was available and explain it is similar to office 365.) I have only used Norton 365 and have no knowledge about Norton Internet Security.Although I am satisfied overall can't say I would readily recommend Mychoicesoftware to someone after the inconvenience of store hours and the product switch.
What I revived was a well used envelope containing a questionable windows 7 disc which only loaded after numerous attempts. Not sure what I have is leget.
the person on the phone listened to my problem then transferred me to another person who was unable to help me . They are returning my money soon I hope.

I understand that McAfee Total Protection is a more "premium" product than the "Internet Security" but the purpose i specifically ordered the "less premium" product was that it was the one i specifically needed. I do not need the add on features of the more premium antivirus software as it is for personal use only. Nonetheless, it has been installed and running. But next time, if you advertise selling "McAfee Internet Security", deliver what was advertised, "premium" product notwithstanding. I usually use Kaspersky and i have an issue with its version of "Total Protection" as it eats up more computer resources, the very reason why i switched to McAfee and bought specifically the Internet Security, not the more premium product.Thanks

I was looking for an online download for MS Publisher 2010.  I went through the purchase procedure, which went well, and quickly received the link to start the download.  When I started the "Download to your computer", I was advised to download MEGA, or "Continue slow browser download".  When I selected the latter because I have had my fill of useless third party add-on software, I was redirected back to the "Download to your computer page".  I then sent a quick chat describing above but never received a reply.Then it gets humorous,  I dialled a help number, 1 800 318 1800 and was asked to answer three questions about taking a cruise.  The old bait and switch, and very unprofessional.  I then called 1 800 318 1439, and a young man advised that I could not download with MS Internet Explorer, and would need Firefox or Chrome.  I said that this was odd as you are selling MS software.  I used Chrome and it downloaded successfully.To send this comment, I am now asked to "Post and verify with Facebook, which I never use or e-mail. Purchased Office 2010Pro.  Promptly received a download link and product activation key.  When attempting to activate online, I received a message stating that this key could not be activated because it had been used too many times.  I chose the option for telephone activation, and the process worked fine, the product activated without any problem. So why are there so many 5 star ratings?  Because in a follow up email from support at:  s*****t@my******software.com you have the option for a $5 refund on your purchase:-------------------------------------------------------------Want to earn a $5 refund on this purchase?  Complete a 5-star review about your experience with My Choice Software from the link below:h***s://www.*****pilot.com/evaluate/my******software.com  Send an e-mail to A***@my******software.com   Receive $5 back to your credit card used to make the purchase!--------------------------------------------------------------- I guess I will not be getting a $5 refund.  This store is a "Google trusted store" which is why I proceeded with this purchase, but now I am wondering if the product was actually legit.  If it were legitimate, then the online activation should have worked. Update:  I was asked to remove references to the actual people who wrote the email, as well as any links to the site being reviewed: so they have been replaced with ***

So I was a bit skeptical using this site to do a purchase but Google showed me it was trusted. And it also had the software I need, Windows 11 pro for a cheaper rate that Microsoft sells it for. The transaction went smoothly, but it took 24-48 hrs for an online delivery, which was why I gave it 4 stars. I thought if it was purchased online, it would be instantaneous but I had to wait to receive the software. But other than that, this site is legit and I was able to install my Windows 11 Pro on my computer.

Good Installation support. Available human response.Not always as easy to install without their help.Therefor, order early in week and day so if installation takes more than a day, you will not run the risk of not having an activated copy over a night or weekend.

Good human telephone support!You will probably need to call for support when the screen comes up and informs you that activation key will not work.  So purchase early in day and allow time to call to be assisted in activating license key.Also, you will probably have to uninstall previous editions of Office to get this product to install correctly.

In the end, the process was simple. However, it could have been made a bit clearer, with the download process explained up front, not in a post purchase email. Not a complaint, just a friendly suggestion.

Initially, I was sent a license for the wrong version of the software (they sent me a newer version, but I wanted the older one). But just one email to support got an BLAZING FAST response, and it was fixed!  Turned out to be a life-saver for me, because the only other sites I could find selling this version were really sketchy-looking or downright fraudulent sites. I saw the negative reviews in places, and the complaints on BBB, but I took the leap to purchase from MyChoiceSoftware because I could see on the BBB page that they were responding to and resolving the concerns of customers who filed the complaints. Even before I purchased, they were very responsive to my emails-- plus it was clear that those responses were coming from real people who had actually read what I wrote! In the end, I think I made a good choice. I got exactly the software I wanted, got it installed, activated, and up-and-running very smoothly!

Review.Contenu: Easy to follow website and download instructions.

Bought Microsoft Office and it eventually downloaded fine, but the instructions need to be a little clearer for someone like me, who is not tech savvy. In the end, glad I dealt with them and savings were significant.When I had a question, was easy to reach tech support and got the help I needed.

I bought Microsoft office from them and found some problem with it. I immediately contacted with them. As they were so genuine and ready to help their customer, they quickly understood the issue and admitted that the mistake from their end. I love the way they are working and handling the customers. My experience was very good and I was satisfied with their help.

We downloaded SBS 2012 from Microsoft and installed on two of our virtual servers (upgrading from 2010).  Researched pricing for the licenses and found best price at Mychoicesoftware.Due to internet problems when purchasing online, I had to call for assistance. The sales rep was very courteous and took care of our issues immediately. We downloaded and installed the licenses with no problems.

Review.Titre: Harder an longer to install software plus extra step for license
Review.Contenu: Normally when i had bought software online it was easy to install, the license was provided an it was a one step process but with this one i had to get license an install them twice which was a problem for me because i was required to set up software on the phone an made mistake leaving my cell phone with the answering machine, hopefully it gets deleted but its better to do second option

After buying an older version of MS Office and installing it, I had issues with an installation wizard that wouldn't go away. I chatted with customer service, and they told me how to resolve the issue. Everything is great now and I appreciate the follow up emails! I would buy from this company again! Note: if you buy Office 2010, do NOT use the "smart phone" option to verify the installation ID code.

Review.Titre: Be aware of the small print
Review.Contenu: Ordered an upgrade to Windows 10 Professional, and they tacked on a free trial to Office 365 that I did not need.  According to them, because I did not cancel the free trial I hadn't requested nor needed, they began charging my credit card for it.  In the end, they refunded the money, which was much appreciated, but using these kinds of tactics is reprehensible.  So make sure you read the fine print.

Finding, ordering and downloading Office 07 was easy enough but after I put in the product key the problem started.  Apparently someone else had been issued the same product key as me and Microsoft made me go through a process of confirming the key and then they sent me a validation key after 6 hours of dealing with this.  Once I got the validation key everything was good.  So despite that issue I still give them 4 stars.

The purchase and software download process was pretty easy and straightforward. My only issue was with the software activation. The online activation didnt work. It said that the number of seats had already been exceeded for that product key. However, the over the phone activation did work and it wasn't too painful of a process. Overall, i am happy with my purchase.

I was really impressed with the wide selection of programs available thru Mychoicesoftware.  I was kind of skeptical at first, because I was looking for an older version of a big-name program...  It took an extra bit of effort to get the program registered and working as a full version, but it was worth it!  Thanks so much!

Called sales prior to download with a few questions. Rep was very friendly and informative. The download was simple and we encountered no problems with the installation. Once installed the product works great. Would have given five stars, but like others we had a few issues with the activation... however, it wasn't that difficult to work out. Just followed the steps to get everything up and running. Since then, so far so good.

It would have Been a 5 star, but, the activation key was off by 1 digit. Once I finish playing around and figuring out exactly which digit was wrong, I call  support for help and received  the corrected key in less time than it took the call to go through. I will definitely buy from them again and I have already started recommending them. The support was 5 star.

Review.Titre: Initially Skeptical - Now a return customer
Review.Contenu: I am always skeptical of "cheap" software but after 20+ purchases of Microsoft Office and various phone calls/emails I know for sure that they are 100% legit. My only knock and the reason for the 1 star reduction is that they call you and ask all kinds of questions to try and sell you on a partnership plan where you receive 2% back on purchases. It's a neat setup but I can't stand it when a company calls me on my cell without my consent.

Review.Titre: Purchasing Office smooth but some activation issues
Review.Contenu: Purchasing Office was easy but we did have some problems with automatic instillation - we had to call Microsoft in order to get authorization as it was saying it was already on too many computers.  However, once on with Microsoft it went through without a problem.

Review.Titre: Thrilled to be back to Microsoft Word & Excel
Review.Contenu: This is the third review I've written to Mychoicesoftware....I am thrilled to using Microsoft Word & Excel again after a three years since I bought my Mac Book Pro.  I tried Apple's Pages & Numbers applications but find Microsoft Word & Excel much easier to share documents with other people in other who I am working with.

I got exactly what I ordered within a day (I ordered on a Sunday) and when I had a question, I called the 1-800 number and the agent was extremely friendly and helpful. However, I saw this company on kijiji in Victoria, Canada and thought the price of the software was in Canadian $. I was unpleasantly surprised to see I was charged in USD.

I recently purchased the Microsoft office 2010 Professional software from MyChoice. I was unable to run the software and wasn't able to sovle the problem via customer service chat session. MyChoice staff was very helpful, they were able to access the computer remotely and setup the software. I will recommend them for software purchase.

I ordered Visio through an academic license but it won't install. I called support and the tech was kind and clear but could not help me. I then was sent to Microsoft Support for MS Volume License Support, who then shuttled me to MS Tech. Support, who then sent me to the MS website to submit a request for support - at a cost of 5 times what I paid for the software. I suspect this is not a My Choice Software problem . . . but I am frustrated none the less . . .

Review.Titre: Good - sent me inconplete instructions but was helpful in fixing it.
Review.Contenu: I bought a Windows 10 Home Edition key, and since they were out of those I received a Pro Edition key instead.  Expecting a home edition key, I'd already installed it on my PC, but the email they sent out only covered fresh installs of Windows.  Upgrading from home to pro requires a completely different, temporary key, which I promptly given when I called them.  Good service and price, but having both sets of instructions would have saved me a bit of headache.

My purchase wasn't working as expected so I called to ask why.  Turns out, operator error - I bought the wrong version.  Ugh.  I would have given a 5-star review if they could have credited the wrong purchase, but they worked with me on price for the 2nd one.  Probably better details on what's NOT included would help buyers.  ;)

I was pretty much without experience and had to take another completed schedule, provided by other, and open it on this software to understand the procedure.  I'm still learning the system but with all the open TASK MODE, TASK NAME, DURATION, START etc cells I can somewhat extrapolate what to do to make a construction schedule.

Purchased Office Professional 2010. Everything went smoothly until I entered my product code. I got a message that said it was used too many times. I emailed Mychoicesoftware and they told me to do it by phone.I did and in less than ten minutes everything was fine. I would use Mychoicesoftware again if I had the need for programs.

Purchased Office with little issue. They were having a website ordering glitch at the time but a message letting you know to call and order it. But refreshing the site let me reorder online. Everything processed quickly and the download link showed up shortly there after. From there there were no issues downloading or installing.

Review.Titre: A little difficult but satisfied in the end.
Review.Contenu: Originally the order was not processed timely.   They said it fell through the cracks due to having to call in a correction on  the billing address.  I called to check the status several days later and it had not been processed.  Once they were aware of this they apologized and all parts of the order were eventually processed.

I was a little nervous about buying from MyChoice Software but the reviews seemed to indicate a good experience.I received my software download instructions the same day. I copied to dvd, following the instructions and installed windows 10 the next day.  Process was very easy and went very smoothly.The price was very good.

Review.Titre: Worked Well, but required Phone Activation
Review.Contenu: This purchase was quick and easy. I would buy again. The only complaint I had was that I got an activation error when trying to activate over the internet. This required me to call into Microsoft and get a confirmation code to continue my activation. I was able to do that successfully. Other than that, I would purchase again!

The purchase I made with MyChoice Software was MS Office for Mac. I am thoroughly pleased with my purchase. I tried to upgrade my earlier version, but I was unable to do so, therefore I ordered the program from MyChoice Software and received it right away and installed it immediately. I really appreciate their help. Gail

I am pleased with this product, I have yet to read all of the "fine print" as I am a busy lady with college and work both full time. Despite this I am extremely satisfied and will look to this website in the future for software purchases. I plan to re-rate this product in a year and hope I am equally satisfied.

The software had some problems after installation, i spent a lot of time on the phone with your rep who tried to help me, but in the end i had to uninstall and reinstall the software to make it work right.  I was concerned about the purchase since my software said "from another computer" in the properties section of the software,  and i had to wonder about this!  This makes me a bit uncomfortable thinking perhaps this was a used software but the product key was accepted and so i am using it.

I need Office for my Mac to communicate with some cohorts who use all Microsoft equiptment.  I had trouble setting up my account with microsoft and grew discouraged.  But Mychoicesoftware stayed in touch with emails, and I struggled thru my troubles with Microsoft.  I would buy more software from this company.
Well done. Good service from Finn

Installation is working well. Good price. Quick response to purchase. One problem that led to 4 stars instead of 5 was that the key would not activate automatically over the internet. I had to use the telephone method and get an activation code. Kind of a pain, but it worked and everything is working well.

Software works fine. Only complaint is amount of time between purchase and ability to download. Took about 30 minutes, so am losing a star for that.But customer service responded on a weekend and helped me understand that another email would be coming with download instructions.Good service and vlaue

Order #2000444411Hello MyChoiceSoftware,My overall experience was positive but had an issue with receiving the initial install email.  Your support team had sent an email for a hold to verify my information which I responded to immediately by calling.  The support representative notated the issue was resolved and an email would be received with the link.I waited until this morning to no avail.  I had to call support to request to have it manually sent.  I did confirm I did receive it after having to call back.  The representatives were courteous and friendly and did resolve my issue.Thanks!Jason Harris

We've purchased a number of Windows 7 Home to Pro upgrades in support of a project.  It became clear this is a manual process on the back end to deliver the keys so after hours isn't happening but they are very responsive during business hours.  Will use them for this every time.

I needed a copy of Office 10 and Mychoicesoftware was the only place that still was offering that version.  Tried doing the install on a Sunday and ran into problems; checked their support hours which was listed as Monday - Friday - and sent off my email asking for help...really not expecting a response until some time Monday. However, much to my surprise, I got an immediate response!Mychoicesoftware was there the during the whole process and the install was a success.  Thank you.Support means everything!  And your customer service team (David and Alex) were right on.

Needed help downloading Office 2010 which it turned out I'd ordered in error. What I intended to order was 2011. Once I'd successfully installed the wrong program, Mychoice quickly assisted me in correcting my mistake and facilitating the correct installation.

I would give this a five, but while trying to download the program, all the links disappeared and I couldn't figure out how to make sure that it had downloaded.  I finally went to windows explorer to make sure the program was there and that I could actually use it.

Purchased Windows 10 to install on my MacBook Pro. After getting right file type and assistance from your support staff all was well. Detailed instructions for this would have saved me some time though. Good part was quick support and software runs good on my MacBook

Review.Titre: Thanks for getting me up to date.

Review.Contenu: Easy to order and great customer service.  I did have to call customer service because although I got confirmation of my purchase I was not seeing the payment on my credit card.  The order had gotten hung up somewhere and after the call everything went smoothly.

Review.Titre: Good value (Could use a little more QA for keys.)
Review.Contenu: It's a good value for a windows key, but took several exchanges of email before I got the right key, it appears there may be something broken. To their credit however, they did work through the issue and contacted the software vendor directly. (Microsoft)

The call in activation works fine, but the online version never works. If the online version is unsafe, just do away with it, and use the call in only. The problem with that is the customer has to use their personal cell phone to receive the activation code.

Placed order and got email that software would need to be substituted for another version.  Was given option to cancel if I wasn't happy.  Software came in worked perfectly.  I appreciated the heads up and how it was handled.  I would order again.

Thank you for your help. And the follow up Email. Very good customer Service. As someone who has been in customer Service  for 30 years, I appreciate it I received my purchase yesterday 11/29/16 ,it was a gift for my son. He loved it.thank youKELLY

Overall a good experience. It took several hours to receive software as I ordered on a Sunday evening, but that was expected.  Had a confusing message about 32 bit versus 64 bit but installed 64 bit and had no problems.

Review.Titre: Easy purchase with my choice software
Review.Contenu: I read a number of product explanations for Microsoft 2019.  I found your site as easy to read as the others. Check out went very well, no problems at all.Directions for installng appear clear and I am about to activate .

Review.Titre: Had a problem downloading Home Student…
Review.Contenu: Had a problem downloading Home Student 2019, but a call to Support cleared up the problem.  Downloaded fine and installation completed.  Would recommend Mychoice software to anyone looking for affordable software.

I purchased Office 2019 Home & Student edition. Best price on the internet. The download went fine. Had to certify license over the phone with Microsoft which took a little time. Programs work great. Thank you.

Review.Titre: The product key you provided does not work. Still.
Review.Contenu: The product key provided me does not work. When I go to Microsoft support, they recommend I purchase an upgraded product key from them. What's up with this?After posting my initial review, I received an email from the vendor asking for a screen shot of the product key failure error message. After sending this to them, they promptly replied with a new product code for me to try, which I did, twice. It failed twice. I sent another email informing the tech of the results.After the third failed, My Choice has arranged a one-on-one phone resolution of this issue. I appreciate the fact that they strive for 100% satisfaction. Stay tuned.

I purchased windows 10 from MyChoiceSoftware and it arrived via email  within 30 minutes. However I did have to call Microsoft support to activate the operating system but that process took less than 10 minutes. Overall great service.

Everything went smoothly and quickly. I received the codes within 1 hour of my purchase and was able to download smoothly and quickly. Only caveat is I haven't had a chance to fully test, only opened and tested basic function.

Aside from the pop-ups, the purchase and download went well. The pop-ups, however, are very annoying and often blocked the screen. I saw no x to detele the pop-ups, so I had to try to work around them.

They sent me a couple of links for the download that didn't work. They had me try Chrome and Firefox but they didn't work either.  Then they sent a Dropbox link and it worked fine.  Customer service was very responsive.
Download and installation of Microsoft Home and Student 2019 went fairly smooth.  Did need help installing a couple of times and My Choice Software was quick to respond.  Satisfied with purchase.

I purchased Microsoft Visio 2013 Pro. At first I had some issue with installing the software on My windows 10 computer. I contacted their support and received a response and solution promptly and got the software installed.

Support was excellent.  I was able to get the help I needed promptly.I was baffled why I could not download the soft ware right away when I purchased it, sort of like iTunes.  However, in all, it is a good service.

Review.Titre: Four out of Five ain't bad
Review.Contenu: I got the software, I got the key, I installed it on my computer and it works. I dinged them one star because of the funky confirmation process but I suppose it's for protection of the customer and the vendor.

Could not find the activation instructions/key initially and after a single email to them, I got the link and clear instructions and was able to activate it without a hitch. I would buy from them again.

Had a little challenge with the MicroSoft product key but I think it was all on MS not on the MyChoiceSoftward. I had to call a couple times and the rep was very patient and we got it figured out. Very happy.

The prices are great. The activation process a little more complex than I expected, but it worked the first time, which is better than I can say for a different software vendor. Thanks for the opportunity!
When I initially tried to install the software, Microsoft refused the code.  It turned out I had to call them because it was an old product.  It would have been nice if I had been told that up front.
Software download was good, but getting confirmation code to activate was a challenge. I downloaded on a Saturday and had to wait until Monday late morning to activate as I am on the East Coast.
Easy process but some of the emails went to regular inbox while others (especially the one with setup process and activation codes) went to junk so it delayed process...
With regards to Microsoft Office, the product is well known, but the customer service at MYchoicesoftware was prompt and friendly when I had a small delivery issue. I highlyrecommend them.
I got good customer support to install my product. It is working fine. This was the most economical option to give me the applications that I use without having to renew a subscription.

Review.Titre: Since I do not understand electronics I…
Review.Contenu: Since I do not understand electronics I did not this order was sent to my E-mail. I have now installed Windows 10 on this  PC. I hope it works. Thank you for setting straight.

I purchased this for my husband, this is his review: I'll start off with the positive - It's installed and it works now.  Now for the few issues that I experienced.  First, the download initiated as soon as I hit the link.  However, since a new window didn't open, I hit the link several more times before realizing it was downloading in the background!  No problem though.  Then after it was mounted, I got an error that it was a 32 bit, not 64 bit.  But there was an option to install the 64 bit version.  Ok.   Finally, when I input the product key, I got an error message that it had already been used.  The good news was that the Microsoft activation wizard automatically gave me information to contact them by phone if the message was in error.  After some time and giving them a 56 number code & entering back in a 48 number code, everything works fine!!
Service was very good, Spencer was very responsive.  Could use a warning about the software actuation process.  Cost me a lot of time trying to get product (Office 13) activated.
There were difficulties in online registration of a software package I'd acquired through Mychoice, but the email link ensured a rapid response and resolution of the problem.

Tyler was very helpful and knowledgeable about the problem that I was having. He was able to provide a solution in a very timely manner. I will definitely buy from My Choice Software in the future and would highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: I want to thank Dustin for the…
Review.Contenu: I want to thank Dustin for the fantastic job he did.  He not only resolved the issues I had but also gave a follow up call to make sure all is working ok.  He went way beyond my expectations and this is coming from a person that has been a customer service professional for over 20 years.Thanks again!

Review.Titre: Outstanding Support from Finn and My Choice
Review.Contenu: Finn was amazing in helping me get my software activated.  He went above and beyond to help me and make my activation a success.  It's hard to find people willing to help like that now days and I really appreciate the help and follow through.  Thank you Finn!

Tyler did a great job! I was a bit lost trying to install this software. Did not realize that I had actually downloaded it, and had no idea what to do afterwards. But Tyler knew everything that had to be done, and did it very efficiently!Thank you so much for your help.

Kat, Ryan and Dustin provided excellent and very knowledgeable support in the installation of my Microsoft Office product.  Their knowledge of the Microsoft products and the idiosyncrosies of dealing with the Office suite on a new laptop was very important in allowing me to get my new product installed successfully.

My experience was great. I am 61 years old and the young man who took my call explained clearly and sent me detailed instructions. I was able to install the software myself. Unfortunately, I ran into a Bios systems error. I will need a new computer. I called to see if I could get a refund. Kat answered, she was very nice and took care of my problem. You have two great Representatives! :)

Wow! I am so impressed! The customer service provided by My Choice Software is "Out of This World Wonderful!"  We purchase new computers infrequently.  My husband recently purchased a new store demo computer with Office 365 pre-installed.  I had ordered from My Choice Software in the past receiving discs with the previous orders.  This time we decided to go with a download link of Office 2019. I was a little nervous, but decided to go ahead with this option. First, I called 3 times and the phone was answered very quickly all three times!   My third call was answered by Kat and she was truly a life saver! At this point, I had realized that I should have uninstalled MS Office 365 prior to installing my new Office 2019 software from My Choice Software.  The Office 365 had literally been taking command of the situation and I needed help.  Kat was very patient and kind. She  was able to assist me remotely and removed the pesky Office 365 software for me and made sure that all of the Office 2019 programs were properly loaded. It was such a relief and we are very happy customers!

Review.Titre: There really is help if you call the help number on the download email!
Review.Contenu: I needed help installing Office 2019 software that I purchased from Mychoicesoftware.com.  I called the telephone number on the instruction sheet and Greg, who was in California, quickly sorted out the installation for me.  He was very knowledgeable, and above all patient.  We had the software up in running in minutes. The download email came very quickly after purchasing the software.

Review.Titre: I needed help with activation code and…
Review.Contenu: I needed help with activation code and after calling the help number on the download sheet, Tyler, a Tech for Mychoicesoftware, quickly helped me get my software activated.

Review.Titre: Mychoisesoftware was out of stock when…
Review.Contenu: Mychoisesoftware was out of stock when I ordered.   They were nice of enough to call me and tell me about this and then gave me a call to tell a couple day later when they had it back in stock and gave me a code to discount my order
I was having issues installing the purchased software and after contacting My Choice Software support I was provided a step by step fix in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: I was very impressed, with a couple of very minor complaints.
Review.Contenu: + I was very impressed and greatly appreciated that they actually answered their phone. The pre-sale support was great, they made sure that they gave me all the time I needed to answer all my questions and evaluate my purchase.- Although minor complaints, the website advertises 30-minute digital delivery, it took 1 hr. 45 min. Also again minor, the download instructions, download, and installation of the software were all flawless, but the software was not current and needed almost four hours of updates.All the above being said, I will recommend this site to my friends, and it will be my go-to site in the future.Thank You, My Choice Software you're doing all the right things, don't let that stop you from continuing to grow even further.

Review.Titre: MS Office - Alex to the rescue
Review.Contenu: The call with Alex shows talking is better than typing,  After multiple attempts through Paypal correspondence, after Microsoft muddied the water with naming everything 365, and after much frustration Alex, a true professional called and took care of all my issies.  Thank you Alex

Review.Titre: The software is good but the associates, specifically Mr. Finn O.
Review.Contenu: My experience was greatly enhanced by the support and help given to me by Finn O.  He went over and above to resolve my problem with downloading and installing my software.  He did almost every because I told him I have low vision and was having trouble. His calming demeaner and knowledge and ability helped me to understand that it was going to work this time.
Thank you for helping me through a Microsoft server 2016 key activation. Ryan and Greg were very helpful. They showed patience and quality time to help me get the key activated.

Review.Titre: There is nothing that O can think of off hand
Review.Contenu: The gentlemen's name is Finn. Not only did he help me with the issue that I was having with installing the program, but he waited on the line to make sure that it installed properly and was functioning. I repair computers for a living, and I deal with technicians and support all the time and in this day and age it is rare to find somebody as efficient as Finn. I know that if I call up again with any other problems that I can safely say that if the rest of the technicians are half as good as he is I would have no problems that could not be solved.Thanks again and I will be buying my software from your company from this point forward,Jeff James

Review.Titre: I needed to complete a document for…
Review.Contenu: I needed to complete a document for work on Microsoft Word. When I opened my office, it asked for the product key. Because I had downloaded the program, I searched for the key in my emails, but could not find it.I called you, and Ryan helped me with a new download of MS office 2019. I am back up and working.Great job Ryan, and thanks.
He made it super easy and understood exactly what I needed. He made it enjoyable talking to customer support and we all know it's normally a pain in the butt.

Smooth transaction. Got an email stating item was out of stock and would be several weeks coming in. MyChoiceSoftware offered me a complimentary upgrade due to the stock issue, therefore I got more than I bargain for. It was absolutely a pleasure doing business with you and look forward to doing the same in the near future. Thank you..
Greg S. helped me with an activation problem,he was very helpfull and made it easy

After 3 different agents on 4 different phone calls, and darn near having a nerves breakdown last week, Greg, my agent today, knew exactly what needed to be done, and he got me up and working with forbearance, courtesy and a professional attitude for which I was very grateful.  I'm 74 years old and taking treatments for stage 4 cancer so I truly appreciated Greg's patience.  Greg never showed any irritation at the length of time it took to get this Mac going.  Greg is my new favorite person today.
Was only on hold a short time getting my Microsoft office student 2019 registration key. Tyler was a huge help and keep it really quick and simple to access!

Review.Titre: Tyler V from MyChoice Software is Amazing
Review.Contenu: Tyler from My Choice Software is an amazing person to work with on the phone when asking questions and leading a helping hand in getting your problem resolved. He was extremely patience with me as he walk me through the steps in getting my Windows 10 Home upgraded to the Pro version Overall, he has amazing customer service skills and deserves a raise for his hard work that he puts when going above and beyond his typical duties.
I had some problem with the installation process, and call the help line.  Finn was very patient and walked me through and got everything fixed.

He was great.  Very patient and bent over backwards to insure that my software was installed correctly.  He made me believe that I was his only priority.  I really appreciated his willingness to go the extra mile.
They have great technical support. They work hard to try to help me to upgrade my computer, they really appreciate my business

Review.Titre: Greg at My Choice Software tech support was great!
Review.Contenu: After buying a new computer, I needed additional software. I purchased the software from MyChoicesoftware. Since my new computer ran Windows 11, I was unfamiliar with windows 11, and was having difficulties making the software work. I called the MyChoice Tech support line and talked to Greg S. He was patient, understanding, spoke clearly, and was able to solve my issues. I have never experienced that level of customer service in the past. I would definitely recommend MyChoicesoftware to anyone.

Review.Titre: Good coustomer service from Tyler V.
Review.Contenu: Tyler V. explained the product I intended to purchase and provided a discount coupon.  Great customer service.

I cannot tell you how frustrated I was getting in trying to do something I "thought" I could do. Found out how "non-technical" I can be and greatly appreciated the assistance (and patience) Tyler provided in talking me through to access the program. Also a shout out to Gage, who initially provided information on removing a program that was still in place and impeding the installation of the program.Thank you both for your assistance.

Review.Titre: Tyler was incredibly helpful with my order.
Review.Contenu: Tyler was incredibly helpful with my order. Due to a high customer volume of orders, you weren't able to get me the software under the deadline I had for installation. Tyler was able to instantly process a refund for me, and his courtesy, knowledge and helpfulness make me feel that Mychoicesoftware is a company I will use if I ever need to place another order in the future. I wish all customer representatives were as good as Tyler!

Review.Titre: Tyler was very helpful on getting me…
Review.Contenu: Tyler was very helpful on getting me all set up for my software to be installed on my computer this is the 2nd time I used my choice software and I love the customer service
Thank you for this opportunity, Tyler was extremely helpful, knowledgeableand courteous, but most importantly his guidance got me connected on my computer!Thank you, Lou

Review.Titre: First I had a live chat with Tyler
Review.Contenu: First I had a live chat with Tyler.  Soon after I called the 800# and coincidentally got Tyler on the phone call to get details about a possible upgrade of my Microsoft Home & Student 2019 I purchased in Jun 2021.  He was  very helpful, patient, and knowledgeable on my inquiry for price and features of the available options.  Thank you!
Kat was amazing! I bought the wrong product, Windows 10 pro, I needed 11 pro and was about to give up. Kat Answered on the first ring, fixed my issue in a mater of seconds literally.

Dustin went above and beyond to ensure I knew which Software to purchase as well as how to install it!He made a very scary, nerve racking experience smooth and easy! I really appreciate his patience and help! I will definitely be using My Choice Software for any future software purchases!

Review.Titre: Finn was calm and patient as he walked…
Review.Contenu: Finn was calm and patient as he walked me through the steps to install Microsoft Office. He went out of his way to call me the following day to insure that the software was properly registered.

Gregory and Gabe at Mychoicesoftware were so patient and helpful. I loved that when I called for Tech Support I got a rep usually within one minute of holding. It was so nice not to hang on hold for an hour like other tech support places. And Gregory and Gabe knew their stuff and stayed with me until my problem was solved. Very satisfied and grateful.
The sales manager Tyler helped me to make the final choice of software packages, and answered my questions patiently. As a result, I decided to purchase the packages today.
Thorny IssueIt took several calls to get this issue resolved, but each call allowed me to take the next step in the process.
Greg did a great job. Many hurdles in the installation, but he cleared them all. Very friendly and helpful. Give him a raise!

Review.Titre: The software was exactly what I bought
Review.Contenu: The software was exactly what I bought, easy to download and easy to install.

Review.Titre: I had an issue about the billing address
